title: Youchi na Koi wo Doushiyou
original_name: 幼稚な恋をどうしよう
sinopse:
Sakurano is an omega, he's all alone, and no one gets him. He sells his body so he can move out of town. One day a new guy named Takagi moves in and befriends Sakurano.

(Source: Omegaverse Addicted Scans)

Included one-shot: Yarichin Engage
